mapper.select: select FIRMID, NAME, F_BALANCE, L_BALANCE, Y_BALANCE, BALANCESUBTRACT, LASTWARRANTY, FROZENFUNDS, USER_BALANCE from V_F_FIRMCURFUNDS
select FIRMID, NAME, F_BALANCE, L_BALANCE, Y_BALANCE, BALANCESUBTRACT, LASTWARRANTY, FROZENFUNDS, USER_BALANCE from V_F_FIRMCURFUNDS where NAME=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
